item.title: Need help making a server! plz reward!
item.dc:creator: @spiritlord99 spiritlord99
item.description:
@spiritlord99 wrote:

first u download a server source, then u edit it how u like, then u download hamachi, u bring hamachi up and there will be a tut autamaticaly showing up the first time u run hamachi, create a network, let other people on ur hamachi network by telling them ur network name and the pass for your network, then what you do is run your server,bring up moparscape 3.2 and click start server. then after that u log onto 127.0.0.1, and your server is online to any1, and your i.p adress for your server would be the 1 ontop of your hamachi screen(other players can see it if they are added in your network right next to your name) so any1 that wants to play on ur server just types that i.p on your hamachi screen into moparscape with the port being the 1 u used to run your server, then they should be online your server!

any questions?? was that confusing??

Read full topic
